name: Dance Robo Dance
description:
DOWNLOAD FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE!

Made in 82 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
  • Ctrl Z: Undo
  • Ctrl R: Restart
  • Ctrl B: Next Level
  • Ctrl P: Previous Level
  • Escape: Return to Menu
  • M: Toggle Music
  • K: Toggle SFX
  • H: Show help
